data.product_title: ZEBRONICS PHERO Wired Gaming Mouse with up to 1600 DPI, Rainbow LED Lights, DPI Switch, High Precision, Plug & Play, 4 Buttons
about_product: The stylish and compact Zeb-Phero is a lightweight wired gaming mouse that is easily portable and can be used comfortably every day
This high-powered gaming mouse comes with rainbow LED lights to add a vibrant touch to your gaming set-up.
The mouse has a dedicated DPI button which comes with an adjustable DPI of 800/1200 and 1600 for smooth cursor movement with utmost reliability and precision.
For high precision while gaming this mouse comes with a highly sensitive optical sensor.
The 4 high-quality buttons- Right, Left, Middle(scroll), and DPI control can multiply your productivity. All 4 buttons come with an enormously high lifespan of 3 million clock cycles.
It is compatible with desktop PCs and laptop devices with a USB port connected at the end of its 1.3m long cable enabling a quick plug-and-play.
Ergonomically designed for a longer gaming duration even when it is used on a mouse pad, plain table, or on a plane surface.

data.product_title: Portronics Toad 101 Wired Optical Mouse with 1200 DPI, Plug & Play, Hi-Optical Tracking, 1.25M Cable Length, 30 Million Click Life(Black)
about_product: [1200 DPI FOR SUBLIME RESPONSE] : Perhaps one of the most important aspects of an optical wired mouse is its DPI. It is the standard used to measure the mouse sensitivity for ‘Dots Per linear Inch’, it’s simple the higher the DPI higher the performance while gaming and photo editing. Portronic Toad 101 clocks in at 1200 DPI making it ideal for minimal gaming, photo editing and top-notch work on desktop/laptop.

[USB CONNECTIVITY] : It is compatible with USB A Type which is the most commonly used port on systems found in homes and offices. Just plug the wired optical mouse into a USB port for an impeccable scrolling experience.
[1.25 M CABLE FOR COMFORT] : Decently long 1.35 m cable so that you can easily connect the optical wired mouse to your PC/Laptop and work and work efficiently from an ideal distance.

[OPTICAL SENSOR WITH QUICK TRACK] : The optical track sensor of the Toad 101 wired mouse has the best reaction designed to work on most surfaces. It works equally good on your lap as it would on a flat top stand. Even the minor flick initiates timely responses.
[ALL WORK & PLAY] : With decent DPI and hi-performance Toad 101 wired mouse is crafted for working and casual gaming. Connect with friends over work or a casual online gaming session with Toad 101.

[CARRY IT ANYWHERE, EVERYWHERE] - Toad One wireless optical mouse is the perfect accessory for those who travel for work, executives who give presentations, or anyone who wants greater control and freedom.

[ADDING COLOURS TO LIFE] - This wireless optical mouse comes with a lighting feature to make your working experience a colourful one. Moreover, Toad One gives you 7 coloured light functionality to adjust the lighting as per your desire.
[BATTERY THAT DOESN’T DIE EASILY] - This optical sensor mouse comes with a rechargeable battery through its Type-C charging port. Now work seamlessly for up to 9 days without any breaks or disruption
